scripts.prod: STAGE=prod truffle migrate --reset --network cypress --f 1 --to 7 && STAGE=prod node ./utils/initialize.js
scripts.dev: STAGE=dev truffle migrate --reset --network baobab --f 1 --to 7 && STAGE=dev node ./utils/initialize.js
scripts.staging: STAGE=staging truffle migrate --reset --network baobab --f 1 --to 7 && STAGE=staging node ./utils/initialize.js
